title: MIO Quest Heart Rate Watch(Black)

description: MIO QUEST is a premium fitness tool for any outdoor enthusiast or hardened adventurer. MIO QUEST packs mega function in a small, stylish, fully-sealed, waterproof GPS positioning watch with a built in heart rate monitor. It is ideal for people who exercise across a broad range of outdoor sports including running, biking, and winter pursuits. Run, store and share! Quest Tracks your exercise, stores the data for analysis and lets you upload to your PC to share performance with your on-line community.

MIO Quest is a premium fitness tool for any outdoor fitness enthusiast or adventurer. This fully-loaded heart rate watch is small and fully-sealed for waterproofness with GPS positioning and a built-in heart rate monitor. It's ideal for people who exercise across a broad range of outdoor sports including running, biking, and snowsports. The Quest tracks your exercise, stores the data for analysis, and lets you upload to your PC to store for your own records or share your progress with a social network such as MapMyRun. Thanks to the high-sensitivity GPS positioning, this watch provides accurate tracking even under trees and near tall buildings.
